name: Fox Game Demo
description:
Fox Game Demo is an in-development metroidvania game about a fox who had to flee from its village after it was attacked by an unknown threat.

Inspired by Hollow Knight and Ori and the Blind Forest.

Exploration

The demo currently features the first three areas of the game, eleven areas are currently planned. You are free to explore this pixel-art 2D environment in any way you want looking for new areas, new items you can use and safe spots to save the game.

Combat

Fight enemies with a one-button combat system: only one button is required to attack, click with the right timing to combine attacks and deal more damage. Your options in combat will increase after finding the bow.

Development

The fate of the project is still unknown. If you found this demo interesting, please consider giving feedback! You can follow the development on my Youtube and my Twitter.
